Dear {!Solution.SolutionName} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
As you are all aware, the Lion King performances will be taking place next Wednesday and Thursday. If you are coming along to watch on the Wednesday matinee performance and intend to take your child home with you at the end of the day instead of them getting on the school bus, please can you email Zoe, the bus manager at zoe@bsg.org.cn so she can make arrangements.
Many thanks
Gemma Silk KS2 Leader The British School of Guangzhou +8620 87094788 www.bsg.org.cn
